dashboard.subtitle: Overview

addCardModal.errorOffline: You are offline. Please connect to the internet to perform this action.
addCardModal.errorNoImage: Please select an image or capture one using the camera.
addCardModal.errorApiKey: API Key is not configured. Please contact support.
addCardModal.errorScanFailed: Failed to scan card. {{message}} Please try again.
addCardModal.errorApiKeyIssue: Failed to scan card due to an API key issue. Please check the API key configuration.
addCardModal.errorNoDocument: Please select a document file first.
addCardModal.errorUnsupportedFile: Unsupported file type. Please upload a CSV or PDF file.
addCardModal.errorCsvEmpty: CSV file is empty or contains no data rows.
addCardModal.errorPdfText: Could not extract text from PDF. The PDF might be image-based or empty.
addCardModal.errorDocProcess: Failed to process document. {{message}} Please try again.
addCardModal.errorCameraAccess: Could not access camera. Please ensure permissions are granted. Error: {{errorName}}
addCardModal.errorCameraSupport: Camera access is not supported by this browser.
addCardModal.errorCaptureFailed: Failed to capture photo. Camera or canvas not ready.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.subtitle: Monitor system health, users, and manage OCR settings.
